content: #20721 defines Mul/RingEquivs between various versions of centers induced by Mul/RingEquivs between semigroup/monoid/(non-unital, non-assoc, semi)rings etc. It also defines RingEquivs between endomorphism algebras induced by LinearEquivs, and RingEquiv between Module.End and CategoryTheory.End. It has little mathematical content but it's blocking #20640 and it looks like it's also useful for the new PR #20991. It already has one approval.
